TopicTitle: Does SCANsat work with OPM or other planet packs?

Articles.Content:
I've installed SCANsat and OPM.

I've never tested this out before, but does SCANsat work with bodies introduced into the game via a plugin?

I can see that SCANsat's pull-down menu has (currently blank) maps for the outer planets.
You'll likely get more response if you ask on the SCANSat forum page rather than the general Add-on Discussions page. The modders who support it are more likely to see it there.

On 6/12/2018 at 1:58 AM, Ho Lam Kerman said:

I've installed SCANsat and OPM.

I've never tested this out before, but does SCANsat work with bodies introduced into the game via a plugin?

I can see that SCANsat's pull-down menu has (currently blank) maps for the outer planets.

Yes. It works ofr all ingame celestial bodies, though whether you can scan them is another question.
